official_title: A bill to authorize the project for flood control at Lock Haven, Pennsylvania.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to carry out the Susquehanna River Basin flood control project at Lock Haven, Pennsylvania.
